# [What is a Minidisk]{style="color: white;float:center;text-align:left;"} {background-color="#55cc9d"}

Is an instrument used to understand infiltration in soils, hydrophobicity, irrigation system design, erosion and burn severity.

![](images/mini.png){fig-align="center"}

# [Minisdisk and Data analysis: the main problem]{style="color: white;float:center;text-align:left;"} {background-color="#55cc9d" style="font-size: 80%;"}

A common way is to use an Excel macro, but for handling a large number of samples this can be complex.

![](images/macro.png){fig-align="center"}

# [Minisdisk and Data analysis: a solution]{style="color: white;float:center;text-align:left;"} {background-color="#55cc9d" style="font-size: 80%;"}

We want to provide functions for the modeling of data derived from the Minidisk Infiltrometer device using R.

![](images/gh.png){fig-align="center"}
